doc.title: Plan F
doc.plot: Ed Marko lost sight of "plan A"--literally. The story of this occupational-therapist-turned-auto-mechanic would be unremarkable except that, at the age of 20, Marko lost his eyesight to a degenerative disease. An avowed anti-hero, Marko's modest and unassuming life is powerfully documented in Plan F, which follows his daily routine running his own auto repair shop. Navigating piles of parts, uncooperative employees, a pesky cat, and customers' unruly cars, Plan F is a visual demonstration of the power of reinvention when life changes the plan.
